constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 数组 b 严格递减（b_i > b_{i+1} 对于所有 1 ≤ i < m）

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 操作的目标是将数组 a 变为空

constraints.name: cost_minimization
constraints.description: 需要最小化操作的总成本

constraints.name: feasibility_check
constraints.description: 如果无法通过任何操作序列使数组 a 为空，则输出 -1
constraints.formal: if not possible to make a empty, output -1
